text: Vikram Chand Mahajan (27 March 1933 - 11 August 2016) was an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India as a member of the Indian National Congress. He was the son of Mehr Chand Mahajan a former Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of India. ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website *Vikram Chand Mahajan's obituary Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Lok Sabha members from Himachal Pradesh Category:4th Lok Sabha members Category:5th Lok Sabha members Category:7th Lok Sabha members Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Vikram Chand Mahajan
